name: Orbital Orchestra
description:
Humanity has advanced to the point that we can manipulate solar systems. While this feat is incredible and will surely keep humans alive for thousands of years to come. However it's still unlikely we will last forever, as such humans have started a project to leave music behind in the stars for those who come after us. You have been selected to help create some of that music and share it with the cosmos.

In this game you create planets and moons to make music based on their orbits. Share your creations code with the rest of the world in the comments and try out others creations.

Controls are explained in the game and a general overview of how the mechanics work can be seen in the game page's images below.
